column5: My place is close to family-friendly activities, restaurants and dining that are out in my rural area, along with retail and grocery stores. Area is 25.2 miles from the NRG stadium...driver or Uber friendly. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the area, the neighbors are quiet, the ambiance sets you up to wind down from your activities. The outdoors space has a quaint with a small patio attached. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids). Space is 1550 sq. ft.
